questions.quote: Kramer, are you still on this? I've seen gymnasts. I know what they do. It's not going to make any difference.
Fluff and Fold. The only way to live.  I drop it off. I pick it up. It's a delight.
Kramer, Kramer! I got big trouble with the - with the Van Buren Boys.
I told him I didn't take his Chuckle. I don't eat that gooey crap!
Yeah, and there's a space opening up, and I could get it for you. You just have to pay the tax on it. It'd be like, fifty a month.
I'm having a little trouble with all this. I mean all I ever wanted to do is sing. Now I'm the focus of this big media frenzy.  Nobody in the show will even talk to me.
[quickly whispering] I resent that you said that! That's directed at *me*, isn't it?!
I have no patience for lactose. And I won't stand for it. Um, I'll be right back.
For example, now, I call you whenever I'm inclined and vice versa.
Hey, Bogambo - they've been in the neighborhood for 48 years. Now, come on, Jerry. You've gotta have a pair of shoes in need of a cobblin.'
